basic_info.description: Hi my name is Cole Gibbs and I’m a Full Stack Python Developer. Before transitioning to Software Development, I was pursuing a Chemistry degree, but I took a coding class as an elective and was hooked. I then transitioned to a rigorous programming boot camp at Code Fellows, which has prepared me to be a strong asset to your company. I’m a strategic and logical thinker, love solving problems and working through challenges, and I’m a great collaborator.  These traits help make me a great programmer and a valuable team member. I am committed, creative, project orientated and can’t wait to join a team and use my passion and skills to create cool product

projects.title: Placeholder for 401 final project
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Placeholder for 301 Final project
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Codle Game
projects.description: My team and I created a study guide, spell out the terminology and when you complete it can bring up an example or description of what the code term means. Then you can play another round. Animations and color changed will indicate if you are right or wrong about words and letters.
